my parents met at woodstock.

i spend an hour getting ready in the morning.
I am a person who loves the cold weather and enjoys living in rural Wisconsin.
My parents are proud of me, even though they don't understand my job.
I have to find a way to get my siblings to take the cure.

content.text: Hi, I'm a single writer. I love making people happy with my music.
Cool, I'm a traveling salesman. I love meeting new people.
Where have you traveled to recently?
I woke up in a different hotel every morning. I've been all over the country, and even a few countries overseas.
That's so cool! I would love to travel more. What's your favorite place you've been to?
I love the cold weather, so my favorite place is probably Wisconsin. I live there now, and I love exploring the state.
I've never been to Wisconsin, but it sounds beautiful. I'm from California, and I love the warm weather here.
I've been to California a few times, but it's not really my thing. I prefer the cold weather.
I guess so! But it's cool. We can learn from each other.
